name: Comfi FZ-LLC
profile_description: Comfi is an embedded BNPL solution that helps B2B SaaS companies to sell 2x more annual subscriptions by letting their customers pay in zero-interest installments, while vendors are paid upfront. Comfi helps to increase the cash flow of a SaaS company and save up to 30% of SaaS costs for end customers.
